;Pay Dolphin challenges riding the merry-go-round. Photo provided by the interviewee

;

;26-year-old Fu Doudan (pseudonym) had two nights of insomnia after a video went viral.

;

;In that video, Fu Doudou, who is 1.7 meters tall and weighs 286 pounds, was riding a high-speed train wearing a pink tutu and squeezed into a second-class seat. , stuck himself in the seat, with an expression of despair.

;

;Whose problem is it that "plus-size girls" can't be seated in second-class seats on the high-speed rail? Netizens are talking a lot. Some people support that "plus-size girls should be seen," while others accuse Fu Doudou of saying, "If you don't lose weight, you blame it on the high-speed rail."

;

;"We made this video not to blame the high-speed rail department, but to express that we did encounter this problem." Fu Doudu said that the video went viral After the fire, she saw the plight of a group. "At first, I thought I was the only one encountering this situation. Surprisingly, many plus-size girls sent me private messages, saying that they would have the same difficulty."

;

;On October 26, 2023, the Guangzhou High-speed Railway Customer Service Center responded to a Southern Weekend reporter, "If there is a need in this regard, we can collect information and feed it back to the relevant departments here."

;

;On the afternoon of the previous day, Southern Weekend reporters met Fu Doudou in Guangzhou. She has always been used to being a "conspicuous bag", and she is still a little nervous. She did not expect that she would be pushed to the public in this way.

;

;Fu Doudu said that she suffers from hypothyroidism and other diseases and has been fat for a long time. Being extremely obese also caused her to repeatedly hit the wall when looking for a job. She worked in sales, customer service, and as a plus-size women's clothing model, and eventually started her own business making plus-size women's clothing.

;

;The topic of "taking a high-speed train deck" suddenly became popular, but among the difficulties she encountered, this was actually just an extremely common case. Every aspect of her life reminds her that she is fat, and "fat" occupies almost all of her life.

;

;;

;

;Fu Doudou challenged himself to get stuck in the second-class seat of the high-speed rail. Photo provided by the interviewee

;

;The following is the self-report of "plus-size girl" Fu Doudou:

;

;"We are a group that cannot speak"

;

;My name is Fu Doudou, but my surname is not Fu. My first friend in kindergarten was named Fu. I couldn't contact her for many years. I named her this name to commemorate her. "Dolphin" came from my dad jokingly saying one day that I looked like a dolphin tossing and turning on the bed.

;

;But I didn’t expect that netizens could associate “pig” with “dolphin”. I have been unable to lose weight because I have hypothyroidism and thyroid disease. Growing up, I was always called a "fat pig".

;

;I planned to shoot a video of riding the high-speed train in the early stage. I didn’t dare to go to a place that was too far away. My friend said that I would go to Qingyuan, which is less than half a mile from Guangzhou. Hours. I said try it and went straight over.

;

;After I squeezed into the high-speed train seat, I suddenly found that it was much higher than the next door. My butt was a little nervous, and my lower back was very tight because of the fat. The skirt I was wearing was a little puffy, and I didn't dare to close the armrests for fear that my body would overflow like water, which would be very embarrassing. The same thing happened when I walked down the aisle. I took up the entire aisle in that tutu.

;

;When they first told me that Weibo was popular, my first reaction was to go home and hide, and asked fans and colleagues if they could read the comments for me. , I don’t dare to look at it, it seems like I will be bullied by the Internet.

;

;Before posting the video, I guessed that some people might scold it, but I didn’t expect that netizens would scold it in such a variety of ways that I couldn’t even watch it. A fan spoke up for me online and was criticized by more than 7,000 netizens. Some people said that I was not plus size, but extra large. I also received a private message from a girl, "I suggest you commit suicide, disgusting stuff", and then she blocked me.

;

;;

;

;After the video became popular, Fu Doudou received an online private message. Picture provided by the interviewee

;

;Interestingly, there are also many people who like me. They may comment "I like you" or "You are beautiful". There are also many plus-size sisters who say that they have also encountered this problem and have been called "fat pigs" since they were children. It feels like we are an ordinary group, but we are also a group that cannot speak.

;

;As soon as we go out, we will be discussed. We can't even maintain a peaceful mind. It just so happens that everyone is silent. Maybe everyone thinks they are an exception and no one will help us if we speak out. Some people are disgusted with us when they see us. I was spat on by an old man in a village in the city before.

;

;Once, I was waiting for the bus on the side of the road, and a couple next to me was discussing me. The woman said, "If you were so fat, would you still love me?" The man said, "How could you be as fat as a pig? I will love you." They got on the bus with me and talked to me all the way on the bus.

;

;Some time ago, I was suddenly grabbed by someone at the subway entrance. It was a girl about my age. She asked me how much I weighed, and I said 286 pounds. She said, "You are still eating like this. No wonder you have gained so much weight. It is easy for you to die like this." Although I look big, I am always the one who cries when we quarrel with them.

;

;Some people also say that if I were a boy, I might not be said like this. Because in popular belief, taller boys are more likely to be beaten violently when provoked, but girls may tolerate it.

;

;"I cannot participate in many occasions"

;

;Sometimes, it is easy for others to do it It's hard for me to do things. I will think about whether I want to do it in advance to avoid encountering very embarrassing points.

;

;For example, when I enter the subway, I rarely sit. I usually stand in the corner, because when I sit down, I will occupy 1.5 seats. Sometimes as soon as I sit down, the person next to me will automatically bounce away. Another reason is that fat people do sweat easily and wear less in summer, which makes them embarrassed if they meet others. I have never stepped on other people's toes since I was a child, nor have I ever gone out of my way to squeeze past others.

;

;I have never been to other cities, and I have never been on a plane until now. I've always been so crowded when taking high-speed trains. The plane is even narrower and may not be able to accommodate me. I broke two swivel chairs while sitting on them at work. I also backed out of the elevator silently before because I was overweight. It was very embarrassing.

;

;There are even more embarrassing things. I was renting a house once. I didn't want to damage the landlord's mattress, so I replaced it with my own thin mattress. As a result, when I sat down, a butt-sized hole appeared in the synthetic board underneath and it sank. The bed board had to be recycled. When the staff lifted the bed board down, I covered my face and tried to find a crack in the floor to crawl in.

;

;I don’t often go to dinner parties. I will check in advance whether the stools in this store can accommodate me. There are some plastic stools in food stalls. It is easy for us to fall when we sit on them, and even break other people’s stools.

;

;When I go out to stay in a hotel, I am always worried that the bed will collapse, so I will check the bed in advance. There is nothing that I can settle on casually. Although it is a bit exaggerated to say this, it is true. Every time I travel, I will read a lot of things in advance.

;

;This is also one of the reasons why I am relatively introverted, because I cannot participate in many occasions. Sometimes when everyone goes out to play, I can’t play this or that. As friends, they don't want me to be alone. They might stay with me, but I don't want that.

;

;There are also gyms chasing me to sell cards, and I will be surrounded when I walk on the road. They all think of me like a big customer, the kind of long-term card holder. In fact, I do this, I have always had a fitness card, and I bought it from different places. Since 2016, I have been applying for an annual pass near the school and going there whenever I have time. I did it after work, and it turned out to be a very expensive course, costing more than 100 yuan per class. In the end, the gym ran away, and I still had more than 20 classes to attend, which was a huge loss.

;

;I am so familiar with their sales techniques that I can recite them by heart. Not long ago, a salesperson from a health care product store took me to play games in the store, and I had a lot of fun. happy. Then he came out with a product that said he would lose weight after drinking it. They thought I was easy to deceive, but he did make money from me.

;

;“Life is all about losing weight”

;

;I have a bad memory, and occasionally I feel sad when I think about some sad things. One day, they asked me what I had experienced in losing weight. I cried while thinking about it. I remembered many experiences and couldn’t stop crying. Being fat has indeed put a lot of psychological shadow on me.

;

;I am from Cantonese and grew up in the south. People around me are as thin as poles. But when I was in the second grade of elementary school, I weighed 80 kilograms and looked round. In junior high school, I weighed 120 kilograms and was 1.68 meters tall. When I weighed more than 160 kilograms in high school, my classmates called me macho.

;

;My brother has been thinner than me since he was a child. When we go out, they all say that I steal all my brother’s food. In fact, I don’t. We both eat the same thing all the time. thing. When I was in school, my classmates would treat me as a strong man, carrying books, water and things, and I would be asked to throw a shot put at sports events. But in fact, fat people are not necessarily strong.

;

;My whole life is to lose weight. I have been trying to lose weight, but I have never succeeded. I am very depressed. As long as you eat a little bit of carbohydrates, your weight will quickly increase, and exercise will be useless. Looking at the food outside, you can’t buy this one, and that one is high in calories. For example, I don’t eat sugar-fried chestnuts, and I can’t touch the fried rice noodles, rice noodles, and rice rolls that are very common in Guangdong.

;

;When I was in college, in order to better integrate into the group, I went on a diet to lose weight, and I did lose more than 20 pounds. However, I had health problems, hair loss, and physiological problems. Period is also disordered. And when I'm hungry, I get panicky and feel exhausted. I couldn't keep on losing weight for various reasons, and that kind of giving up has been in my life for a long time.

;

;Last year, I signed up for a weight-loss training camp, where I trained for three months off-duty, and the tuition was 15,000 yuan. Among the 60 students, there are maybe six or seven who are similar in size to me, and we encourage each other. I get up at around 7 o'clock in the morning and do aerobics, do strength barbell and dumbbell exercises in the afternoon, and ride spinning bikes in the evening. A group of people are like a disco.

;

;Practice for four to five hours every day. There are only three spoons of rice in one meal, paired with a small grid of vegetarian dishes and a small grid of meat. But because I ate too little, I wasn’t able to exercise vigorously.

;

;On the third month of training, everyone was coughing, but they still did aerobics while coughing. The whole private room was filled with the sound of coughing, which was very loud. So a plus-size girl doesn’t want to lose weight? Doesn't she want to work hard? We persisted for 3 months, but in the end I only lost 22 pounds. I asked the coach, I didn’t eat anything secretly, why couldn’t I lose weight? He said, "Just don't eat it."

;

;Later I went to the hospital for a check-up, and 11 tubes of blood were drawn, and insulin resistance and hypothyroidism were found. My function is poor and I lose weight slower than most people. Maybe a normal person loses one or two pounds a day when losing weight, but I only lose one or two pounds a week.

;

;;

;

;In 2022, Fu Doudan participated in a weight-loss training camp. Photo provided by the interviewee

;

;I am indeed rejected in many environments and cannot be accommodated at home. Sixty percent of the reasons are because of my figure. My parents may tell others about how awesome their son is, but they never tell others about it because they feel ashamed.

;

;So I rarely go home and I don’t dare to go back. People say it every time. Many relatives would advise me to lose weight, and I could recite what they had to say. My mom would point to a plate and ask me, "Do you know what this is? Your face is so round." You knew she was joking, but knives always cut through the heart.

;

;When I retreat to the point of no return, I will only jump into a bigger pit, and I will really jump. For a period of time, I was ostracized at work and had tense relationships at home. I couldn't lose weight, and I felt very frustrated. Our company is on the 18th floor. I stepped on the railing and wanted to jump off. It happened that a friend I met from work nearby sent me a message asking me if I wanted to go out for an ice cream. That message suddenly woke me up, and it seemed like someone cared about me.

;

;I think I may really have no way to survive. I ate alone, walked alone, hid in the house and didn’t want to see anyone, had a few breakdowns, was depressed, and spent a year in a very silent state. That year. My brother calls once a month and he only asks, are you okay? Still alive?

;

;Until later, the relationship with my family eased a bit and I slowly came out of it.

;

;"Do something you are afraid of"

;

;Change started from a field activity . I used to build a team with people from the company, and dozens of people went to ride mountain bikes and off-road vehicles. As soon as the game started, everyone ran 100 meters away, but my motorcycle kept stalling.

;

;I was also very anxious and didn’t want to fall behind. The coach next to me said impatiently, “It’s very dangerous for you to do this. Don’t drive. I’ll refund your money.” ."

;

;My colleague couldn't stand it. He said to the coach, "If they don't know it, you teach them. Why do you ask them to come down?" I was very moved. , no one has supported me like this for a long time. After the coach taught me, I just started driving and my car crashed again. The coach said again, "Don't drive. Come down and I will refund the ticket and the insurance to you." I said if you let me try again, just try again. That time I really drove up, even though I stalled the engine more than a dozen times.

;

;Did you know? When we reached a very high altitude, my car almost turned over. The slope is very steep, and the car has to rush up quickly. My weight may slow down the speed. But later I saw that it was not only me who couldn't pass that stretch of road, but also many other people, some of whom were too light, and the car really overturned.

;

;After reaching the top of the mountain, several coaches asked me to take a photo. I thought they were joking on me again, but I heard a coach say, "This girl is great. She kept stalling at the beginning, and now she is driving here, and she is really great." He praised me, and I felt warm in my heart that day.

;

;;

;

;Fu Doudo rides an off-road motorcycle. Photo provided by the interviewee

;

;I have never said what I have accomplished that gives me a sense of accomplishment. Others may have ups and downs in their lives, but I have always been there. Volt. In short, this incident made me feel brave for the first time, and also made me reflect on the fact that some things cannot be stopped. If I gave up at the beginning, I would not have that sense of accomplishment.

;

;Another time, a friend from the gym caught me hiking and made an appointment to go to a relatively high scenic spot and climb hundreds of steps. At first, I didn't dare to go up. There was a sister who pulled me on every level. Every time I went up a dozen or so steps, I looked back, thinking about how I would get down later. In the end, I lay down on the steps and tried to go down. Move down step by step.

;

;They helped me, but I said no. I was afraid that I would fall down with you, and my heart rate soared to 180 that day. But every time I do something I dare not do, I gain more courage. Later, I also challenged myself to ride roller coasters and merry-go-rounds, and attractions such as the Chain Bridge. I couldn't accept it before, and I was always worried that it would break if I went on it, so I tried it later.

;

;I am indeed afraid of all kinds of things. Maybe my life was all about losing weight before, but now I want to do some things that I'm afraid of and enrich myself with other things. I also hope that the group of "plus-size girls" will stand up, be brave, and be seen by everyone.

;Ling Chengxing once proposed to "prevent (tobacco control) from becoming expanded, one-sided, and absolute." ;(Visual China/Photo);

;

;On October 23, 2023, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection reported that the former Party Secretary and Director of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration Ling Chengxing is suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

;

;It is worth noting that three days ago, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection announced that the Eighth Central Inspection Team will inspect the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration’s party group work mobilization meeting, which will “highlight the supervision of the ‘top leaders’ and leadership teams and conduct in-depth investigations. Corruption issues in key positions and key areas.”

;

;Since this year, many former officials of the State Tobacco Administration have been dismissed.

;

;He Zehua, former member of the Party Leadership Group and deputy director, was investigated in July, and Zhang Hong, former director of the Department of Science and Technology, was investigated in July. Ling Chengxing is the highest-ranking official dismissed from the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration since its establishment.

;

;Previously, Zhao Hongshun, a former party member and deputy director, was investigated in February 2019, and Pan Jiahua, a former party member and leader of the disciplinary inspection team, was investigated in January 2022. Zhao Hongshun was sentenced to life imprisonment in June 2020, and Pan Jiahua was sentenced to 11 years in prison in April 2023.

;

;;The starting point of official career;

;

;Before Ling Chengxing was investigated, the tobacco system had been continuously shaken, and many department and bureau-level cadres were dismissed intensively across Yunnan, Anhui, Jiangsu and other places, among which Jiangxi, the starting point of Ling Chengxing's official career, was the hardest hit area.

;

;On July 1, 2023, Li Benjian, a former division-level cadre of the Jiangxi Tobacco Monopoly Bureau (Company), underwent disciplinary review and supervisory investigation. According to Caixin reports, this person once served as Ling Chengxing’s driver.

;

;On April 6, Zheng Wei, Party Secretary, Director and General Manager of the Guangdong Provincial Tobacco Monopoly Bureau (Company), was dismissed. He was previously the General Manager of China Tobacco Jiangxi. On the same day, Fu Wujun, the first-level business manager of the Human Resources Department of China Tobacco Jiangxi, was subject to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation.

;

;Shanggao County in Jiangxi Province was the starting point of Ling Chengxing’s career. He started working in 1980 and was promoted to the Standing Committee and Deputy County Magistrate of Shanggao County at the age of 27. Thereafter, he served as director of the Jiangxi Provincial Tobacco Monopoly Bureau, and eventually became a member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee and executive deputy governor.

;

;In 2015, Ling Chengxing was elected as a deputy to the National People's Congress in Jiangxi. A media person who interviewed Ling Chengxing at the Two Sessions told Southern Weekend reporters that during the discussion, everyone still called Ling Chengxing " Governor".

;

;After retiring in 2018, Ling Chengxing was still very concerned about his hometown Shanggao. His only public appearance after retirement was to visit the water supply company in his hometown accompanied by the local county party secretary, county People’s Congress director and others.

;

;;Area hardest hit by corruption;

;

;From 2013 to 2018, Ling Chengxing served as a member of the Party Leadership Group of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group, and Director of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration.

;

;During his tenure, China's cigarette sales fell by 2.4% in 2015, the first decline since 1995, equivalent to smokers reducing their consumption of 60 billion cigarettes.

;

;The reason is that the tobacco tax will be raised by 6 percentage points starting from May 10, 2015. The price and tax rate of the cigarette wholesale link will be increased from 5% to 11%, and the price will be increased by 0.005 yuan/cigarette. A specific tax is levied.

;

;Facing the trend of declining sales, Ling Chengxing, who has always been low-key, took the initiative to accept an interview with the "Study Times" sponsored by the Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, proposing to "prevent (tobacco control) from becoming expanded, one-sided, and absolute."

;

;During the National Two Sessions in 2015, this also became the focus of reporters’ questions. What is the expansion of tobacco control? Ling Chengxing replied: "Let me give you an example. Some people say that bone hyperplasia is caused by smoking. I think this has no scientific basis. What do you think?"

;

;In 2017, China's cigarette sales stopped falling and rebounded. rose, with 47.378 million boxes sold throughout the year, an increase of 0.8% compared with 2016.

;

;In the discussion of tobacco control, the tobacco industry’s government-enterprise integration system has always been the focus of discussion. In the eyes of the tobacco control party, the government-enterprise integration system has become the biggest obstacle to tobacco control in China.

;

;Ling Chengxing’s predecessor, former Party Secretary and Director of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration, Jiang Chengkang, made the biggest institutional reform of China’s tobacco industry by promoting the “separation of industry and commerce” at the provincial level, but the reform failed to continue. further.

;

;After Ling Chengxing took office, he followed the previous ideas and rapidly expanded the scale of the company through mergers and alliances.

;

;The first stop for his research after taking office was in Yunnan. After the merger of Hongyun Group and Honghe Group, the newly established "Hongyun Honghe Group" became the largest group after Altria Group, British American Tobacco, and Japan Tobacco. , the world's fifth largest tobacco group after Imperial Tobacco.

;

;On May 30, 2013, a symposium on cultivating major brands of Yunzhen cigarettes was held in Mile County, Honghe Prefecture. Ling Chengxing, who had just taken over as the director of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration, issued the tobacco "Policy Agenda" for the first time: Adhere to " "Three Stabilities" (the guiding ideology determined at the beginning of the year remains unchanged, the goals and tasks remain unchanged, and the work measures remain unchanged); maintain the "Three Stabilities" (stabilize the leadership team, stabilize the cadre team, and stabilize the morale of the employees); think, plan, and practice "Three major issues" (where are the dividends of tobacco industry reform, where is the potential for development, and where is the goal of catching up).

;

;Ling Chengxing also implemented a number of reforms during his tenure. Starting in 2014, the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration issued the "Key Points of the Market-oriented Reform of Cigarette Marketing" for four consecutive years, but it was limited to the marketing level, focusing on " How can commercial enterprises truly reflect market demand, how can industrial enterprises meet demand in a timely manner, and how can industrial and commercial enterprises respond to market demand in a timely manner?"

;

;Unlike the previous "foreign troubles" in which China Tobacco faced direct competition with foreign brands, Ling Chengxing faced more internal management pressure. During his tenure, many major cases occurred in the tobacco system.

;

;In 2012, a scandal broke out in the Henan Tobacco Monopoly Bureau, and many people including the former director were arrested. There is also the case of Yang Weizu, chairman of Yunnan Ruisheng Group, who is associated with the Yunnan Tobacco Science Research Institute.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, at least a dozen central officials in the tobacco system have been eliminated.

;

;Lu Ping, Party Secretary and General Manager of Hunan China Tobacco Industry Co., Ltd., was investigated in October 2020 and was suspected of accepting bribes of 413 million yuan and misappropriating public funds of 135 million yuan. This case is known as the most serious job-related crime in the tobacco system since the founding of the People's Republic of China.

;

;A disciplinary inspection cadre analyzed the causes of corruption in the tobacco system to Southern Weekend reporters, "The tobacco system is different from other vertically managed departments. It is a system that integrates government and enterprises, and the path to realize power is very difficult. Short, all links are accompanied by indicators, which results in power being permanently concentrated in the hands of a few people and the lack of effective supervision, making it more difficult to fight corruption in the tobacco system."

;

;The Tobacco Bureau even controls the money bags of local governments.

;

;An interesting detail is that during the National People’s Congress in 2015, a mayor publicly appealed to Ling Chengxing that he wanted to improve the quality of cigarette production. “It used to be that Septwolves were basically OEM, and the taxes and profits of Septwolves were relatively low. It would be great if the next step is to produce Chinese cigarettes."

;

;This was refuted by Ling Chengxing on the spot, "That's impossible. China Tobacco is a banner of the tobacco industry." The mayor said with a smile that “it may not all be the pen of the (old) governor” and suggested that better equipment could be invested in production. Ling Chengxing still insisted, "When you come to engage in Zhonghua Cigarettes, you will immediately destroy the Zhonghua Cigarettes (brand)."   

;

;Subsequently, the mayor continued, "While the (old) provincial governor is in the position of the General Administration, a certain city's tobacco industry chain tax revenue can reach 10 billion yuan."

;

;Southern Weekend reporters learned that this media record at the time was preserved under Ling Chengxing's instruction. According to an insider, "He may have just wanted to show that he rejected the other party." The mayor who made this request was dismissed soon after because of his involvement in the Su Rong case.

;

;Many people have said "I don't want to work" when they are sleepy or frustrated, but these words are probably inappropriate. Really, if we don’t have any mines or pie from the sky, what else can we do if we don’t move bricks honestly? But there are indeed some people who regard "no work and someone to support you" as the highest ideal.

;

;A blogger said that since childhood, her aunt has indoctrinated a bunch of little girls, including her, with the idea that girls are "blessed" and can enjoy a good life without doing anything. . Not only do you not have to do anything, but you marry a good family and you don't even need to take care of the children yourself. That is what you are blessed to do. This concept is close to "labor equals shame".

;

;We all have inertia and a desire for comfort. In our subconscious, we may have had the image of just lying down and enjoying ourselves. When I was a kid, I experienced the intense itching pain all over my body after harvesting and threshing rice and wheat by hand. I also had "plans" to stop working. But honestly, just think about it.

;

;The extravagant and luxurious life in books and movies is described in the wonderful lyrics of "Huang Liang Meng" by the Pingdiao Luozi Theater Company in Handan City, Hebei Province: "Endless generosity, endless power; Endless delicacies to eat, endless money to spend; endless carols to listen to, endless gifts to receive; endless wealth to enjoy, endless New Years to live." Ordinary people can just think about it, and really educate themselves like this Children, that's really gone astray.

;

;For ordinary people, when they are minors, they are supported by their parents, and when they become adults, they have to support themselves and their families on their own. If you want to live a good life, you can only accumulate it step by step. This is the first meaning of work for most people: to support their families. In order to achieve this goal, many people work very hard and may not be in a career they like, but they persist because this job can bring acceptable returns.

;

;However, it is very painful to do a job that you don't like for a long time. A friend told me that the joyless days at work day after day were really a torture. But even so, we can't "just leave", we can only wait for the opportunity.

;

;My friend’s words moved me deeply. The reason why people should work hard is because work should have a second meaning: combining it with one's own talents and interests, making the work itself a source of fulfillment and happiness. Many writers have been doing writing work for a lifetime based on their talent and interest. I have also been a media commentator for many years based on my talent and interest. This is a blessing. There is also a kind of work that may seem heavy and tiring, but it may be something that workers like to do. For example, blacksmithing is not acceptable to most people, but in reality there are people who work very hard at it. I also heard a car mechanic say that although it may be tiring and dirty all day long, it is a job that interests him and cannot let him go.

;

;These are the values ​​that ordinary people should uphold, try to do meaningful work and live a meaningful life. In other words, a livelihood should be one that can not only meet the purpose of earning money to support the family, but also satisfy interests and hobbies. Accordingly, we not only get practical benefits, such as income and evaluation, but also spiritual satisfaction. This sense of gain is the spiritual source that enriches us in this world.

;

;Many people envy the financial freedom of wealthy families, but they only know one aspect but not the other. Even among the envied few "giant pandas" in society, most of them do not relax their requirements for their children. Instead, they pay more attention to providing high-quality education and scientific employment guidance to their children, and to promote their children to pursue a decent and respectable career. jobs and better realize the value of life.

;

;Usually, these families need their children to inherit the family business. In order not to be left behind for this goal, they are motivated to help their children avoid becoming "waste" and "dandy children" who only consume high amounts of money and live in vain. Look at the young people who have inherited the family business of wealthy parents today. Which one has not experienced the nourishment of a good education and the tempering of basic work. Many people have the ability to protect their children from dust, but they still let them start from the "workshop" and perceive the meaning of life. This is true wisdom.

;

;Even the many second-generation rich people do not sit around doing nothing all day long, eating, drinking, and waiting to die as some people imagine. In other words, people who are more "qualified" than ordinary people to do nothing work harder than you. What other reason do you have for fantasizing about “doing nothing”?

;

;Don’t forget, if you really have nothing to do, you will definitely fall into emptiness. If a person does not "fill" his life with meaningful things, he will easily fall into emptiness and become as light as a feather. In this case, even if you get a fortune one day, you will not be able to control such wealth. In Yu Hua's novel "To Live", he explained the story of a swinger brother who lost his family fortune by gambling. How many such folk narratives are there? After the demolition in my hometown many years ago, the "second generation" became rich instantly. However, it is not uncommon for them to lose their property overnight due to gambling, dissoluteness, and being cheated.

;

;I am obviously middle class or even poor, but I still always want to live a "fairy life" like a powerful or wealthy family, just enjoying myself and not working. To put it mildly, this is unrealistic, but to put it seriously, it is unrealistic. This is a lack of self-awareness. This idea is difficult to realize. In short, humans are animals of meaning, and meaning is the food of the spiritual world. On top of establishing a good life, people should do meaningful work or career to nourish our spirit. Under the sun and on the earth, we should still let ourselves "sink", settle down, and become human plants that are truly not afraid of wind and rain. This principle applies to both the second generation of rich people and the children of ordinary people. Meaningful work or a meaningful career is the "key" that helps a person lead to a happy and transparent state. Only when you find a sense of presence and cultivate your character in your work or career, can you follow the trend. For, gradually improve.

; Fri, 27 Oct 2023 15:25:04 +0800 冰川记忆：中国珠峰科考六十年http://www.infzm.com/contents/259430
